short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Given a body of text receive a score on how readable that text is based on the flesch-kincaid readability index.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Readability Score is a tool designed to give you an idea of what type of reading level is needed to comprehend your text. The score is calculated based off of the flesch-kincaid index, and provides a grade level, as well as a general "easy medium hard" rating for the text you run it on.
